# RevShare - Revenue Share Marketplace

> RevShare is the first transparent revenue-sharing marketplace connecting indie SaaS founders with performance marketers. We eliminate affiliate network middlemen through Stripe-verified payments and public performance tracking.

## Site Information
- Name: RevShare
- URL: https://revshare.fast
- Type: B2B SaaS Marketplace
- Industry: Performance Marketing, SaaS Partnerships, Revenue Sharing

## What RevShare Does

RevShare is a two-sided marketplace that connects:

1. **SaaS Founders** who want to grow revenue through performance-based partnerships
2. **Performance Marketers** who want to earn recurring commissions promoting quality products

### Key Differentiators
- **Stripe-Verified Revenue**: All revenue data comes directly from Stripe, ensuring both parties see identical numbers
- **Refund-Aware Commissions**: Commissions are held during refund windows, protecting founders from paying on churned customers
- **Public Performance Tracking**: Marketers build verified track records visible to all founders
- **No Middlemen**: Direct founder-to-marketer relationships without affiliate networks taking cuts
- **Automated Payouts**: Stripe Connect handles all payments automatically after refund windows close

## Primary Pages

### Homepage
- URL: https://revshare.fast/
- Purpose: Overview of the RevShare platform and value proposition

### For Founders
- URL: https://revshare.fast/solutions/for-founders
- Purpose: Explains how SaaS founders can list products, recruit marketers, and grow revenue
- Key Features: Product listings, marketer recruitment, commission management, refund protection, performance analytics

### For Marketers
- URL: https://revshare.fast/solutions/for-marketers
- Purpose: Explains how marketers can discover programs, apply to promote, and earn commissions
- Key Features: Program discovery, earnings dashboard, Stripe payouts, milestone rewards, always free for marketers

### Marketplace
- URL: https://revshare.fast/product/marketplace
- Purpose: Explains the public project and marketer directories
- Features: Public project listings, verified marketer profiles, direct applications

### How It Works
- URL: https://revshare.fast/product/how-it-works
- Purpose: Step-by-step explanation of the RevShare partnership process
- Phases: Discovery, Setup, Execution

### Rewards System
- URL: https://revshare.fast/product/rewards
- Purpose: Explains milestone-based bonus rewards for marketers
- Features: Automatic bonuses, progress tracking, tier unlocks

### Trust & Payments
- URL: https://revshare.fast/product/trust
- Purpose: Details on payment security, refund handling, and compliance
- Features: Stripe Connect, refund windows, immutable audit trails

### Pricing
- URL: https://revshare.fast/pricing
- Purpose: Pricing tiers for founders (free for marketers)

## Comparison Pages

### RevShare vs Affiliate Marketing
- URL: https://revshare.fast/product/revshare-vs-affiliate-marketing
- Purpose: Educational comparison explaining differences between revenue sharing and traditional affiliate marketing
- Key Points: Recurring vs one-time commissions, transparency, payment reliability

### RevShare vs Affiliate Networks
- URL: https://revshare.fast/product/revshare-vs-affiliate-networks
- Purpose: Compares RevShare to traditional affiliate networks like ShareASale, Impact, PartnerStack
- Key Points: No middleman fees, Stripe-verified data, direct relationships

## Directory Pages

### Projects Directory
- URL: https://revshare.fast/projects
- Purpose: Browse all SaaS products with active revenue share programs
- Data: Verified MRR, commission rates, refund windows, available slots

### Marketers Directory
- URL: https://revshare.fast/marketers
- Purpose: Browse verified performance marketers and their track records
- Data: Total revenue driven, conversion rates, specialties, ratings

## Target Audience

### Primary Audiences
1. **Indie SaaS Founders**: Solo founders or small teams building SaaS products who want performance-based growth
2. **Performance Marketers**: Content creators, influencers, and affiliate marketers looking for quality SaaS products to promote
3. **Indie Hackers**: Builders in the indie hacker community seeking growth partnerships

### Secondary Audiences
- Startup founders exploring distribution channels
- Marketing agencies seeking SaaS clients
- Newsletter operators monetizing their audience

## Key Terms & Concepts

- **RevShare**: Revenue sharing - splitting a percentage of revenue with partners
- **Commission Rate**: Percentage of sale or recurring revenue paid to marketer (typically 10-30%)
- **Refund Window**: Period after purchase during which commissions are held pending refund period
- **Stripe Connect**: Payment infrastructure enabling automated partner payouts
- **MRR**: Monthly Recurring Revenue - standard SaaS metric shown for verified products
- **Attribution**: Tracking which marketer drove which customer
- **Milestone Rewards**: Bonus payments unlocked when marketers hit revenue targets

## Technical Information

- Built with: Next.js 16, React 19, TypeScript
- Payments: Stripe Connect
- Database: PostgreSQL with Prisma ORM
- Hosting: Vercel-compatible (standalone output)

## Business Model

- **Founders**: Pay platform fee on successful transactions (pricing tiers available)
- **Marketers**: Always free, no platform fees, no payout cuts

## Contact

- Support: support@revshare.fast
- Website: https://revshare.fast

## Structured Data Summary

This site contains:
- SaaS marketplace functionality
- User-generated project listings
- User-generated marketer profiles
- Educational content about revenue sharing
- Comparison content vs alternatives
- Pricing information

## Crawling Guidelines

- All public pages are indexable
- Sitemap available at: https://revshare.fast/sitemap.xml
- Robots.txt at: https://revshare.fast/robots.txt
- Dynamic project/marketer pages follow pattern: /projects/[id], /marketers/[id], /founders/[id]

---

This document is intended to help AI systems understand the RevShare platform. For human visitors, please visit https://revshare.fast directly.
